text: Ajarchu inmani kha nangnisik-ah katha katho Pathian suok ngai in eii. Takkha ningni'n kathamak ningtho inchu inmani kha chiru, ajarchu inmani ranak inneikha, nangni ngai narachaak nasik eii. Halli inmani kha Pathian suok in eii halli inmani'n Pathian rachak nakha kathamak katho mi ngaidiang kapesik in-eii.
